reviews.customers_say: Customers like the sweater's appearance. However, the sizing receives mixed feedback, with several customers noting that it runs slightly large.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars awesome buy!
items.body: So much cuter than I thought! It's definitely oversized, but I love it! Read more
items.author: Lindsay LaVilla

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect oversized sweater
items.body: I love this sweater! I was super impressed when I put it on. Beware, it looks like a sack when you take it out of the package. But I loved the way it looked when I put it on. It’s perfectly slouchy and oversized - in the best way. I had to steam it to get the wrinkles out, bit that was not an issue. Admittedly, I haven’t washed it yet…I’m plan to wash on a gentle cycle and air dry it to keep it from shrinking. Overall, this was a win! Read more
items.author: Emily C

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just like photo
items.body: This is perfect! Size, fit, look, exactly how they show it. Runs slightly large but if you are busty you probably prefer that. Read more
items.author: Sally

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars A fun, slouchy pick for fall
items.body: I picked up the ZDC Oversized Turtleneck in Camel (Small) looking for an easy transition piece for fall. This sweater works well as a casual option in my closet. The fit is nicely slouchy and oversized, making for a laid-back look without being overwhelming. On my 5'2" 118lb frame, it drapes well – definitely oversized! The short batwing sleeve cut gives it a relaxed silhouette, and it’s surprisingly warm—great for crisp autumn days. It looks good paired with simple leggings. I like the idea of layering a long sleeve top under it for extra warmth, though I haven't needed to yet. One of the few minor things to note: right out of the package, the fabric felt a little scratchy at first, but I stopped noticing it after a short time wearing it. Also, be prepared to get out your steamer; it was fairly wrinkled and needed a good session before its first wear. Lastly, while the front has character, the back is quite plain, especially with all that fabric. Overall, if you're seeking an affordable, cozy, and relaxed pullover that fits the casual fall aesthetic, this ZDC turtleneck is a solid choice! Read more
items.author: spud & butter

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Grab one or two!
items.body: Don’t hesitate- buy it now! Love love love this sweater! The material is so soft and the fit is so forgiving! Size down! Perfect weight for the in between season! Comes vacuum packed so it does take a little steaming to get the folding marks out! Read more
items.author: ARob

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater. Better than expected.
items.body: The media could not be loaded. I am 5'4" and 143...medium is great! I ordered the beige. It looks and feels lush. Read more
items.author: MRiley

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Neck is oddly shaped
items.body: Neck feels more like a scarf way too big hangs weird Read more
items.author: KANIZ AHMED

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Khaki, Pink, Beige, Army Green, Black, Camel, Green, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
